channel.title: Jonin Ascension
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Jonin Ascension"

item.title: Re: Jonin Ascension
item.content:encoded:
Jutsu used:
Thousand Flying Water Needles of Death
+2 Gen Strength!

Automatic Jutsu Victory!

Your Jutsu plucks them all from the air, saving your village!

=] The clue was the "thousand". You get the jutsu from Trapchan =]

item.title: Re: Jonin Ascension
item.content:encoded: Specific jutsu means that if you use it, you'll pass the mission regardless of the difficulty or successes. Don't you remember your Genin exam?

item.title: Re: Jonin Ascension
item.content:encoded: i see, specific jutsu means what i should have used. thanks.

item.title: Re: Jonin Ascension
item.content:encoded: Jonin Ascension <â€” That has all the info you should need.

item.title: Re: Jonin Ascension
item.content:encoded: how do i get pass being a legacy of the heros? the rain of death says difficulty is 15 and my tai range is only up to 12. help?

item.title: Re: Jonin Ascension
item.content:encoded:
From personal experience on a WhiteEye alt, Eight Trigrams Whirlwind works. I'm 90% sure that was the jutsu I used.

The RedEye version of the exam is more fun. I've never beaten it using the right jutsu, since I just use brute force instead. :3

item.title: Re: Jonin Ascension
item.content:encoded: Erg. Sorry for that. I think the person who originally wrote up the page had heard that any whiteeye specific jutsu would work there (which is what I've also heard), but there seem to be fewer WhiteEye jonin about. I don't have personal experience so I can't say what works unfortunately, all I can do is apologize for the bad information :(

item.title: Jonin Ascension
item.content:encoded:
Two things, first I just want to say, the guide is wrong. For white eyes Stalker Style: Freaking Laser Beams, does not trigger an auto win, you may want to fix that in the guide.
Second, since I only have enough stamina left for one more shot at the mission, can someone tell me which jutsu does work from personal experience as a white eye?
